title: Tragic: Rook and Ronin, #1
features: ****THIS SERIES IS NOW COMPLETE********MORE THAN 500 FIVE STAR REVIEWS FOR THIS TRILOGY***

How far are you willing to go to start over?Rook Walsh is homeless, jobless, and down to her last ten bucks when opportunity knocks her in the head and delivers a once in a lifetime opportunity.Internationally renowned photographer, Antoine Chaput, knows the minute he spies Rook in his studio that she's got The Look. The dark and desperate look he must have to land the exclusive TRAGIC media contract.Rook is paired up with top model Ronin, and he knows exactly what to do to make her blush for Antoine's camera. Her luck changes in an instant and suddenly she's got more attention and exposure than she can handle--both in front of the camera and behind the scenes.The Rook and Ronin Series has SEVEN books TOTAL(1) TRAGIC(2) MANIC(3) PANICSpin-offs(4) SLACK: A Day in the Life of Ford Aston(5) TAUT: The Ford Book(6) BOMB: A Day in the Life of Spencer Shrike(7) GUNS: The Spencer Book
description: "I have always considered J.A. Huss a brilliant author, but with her latest release, Tragic, I believe she's more than brilliant!" -
"Finally, a book I couldn't put down." -
"Huss does it again with her new book Tragic. The way she is able to go from one genera to another so flawlessly and seamlessly is amazing and just shows how talented of a writer she really is."

Her audiobook, Mr. Perfect, was nominated for a Voice Arts Award in 2017. Her audiobook, Taking Turns, was nominated for an Audie Award in 2018. Five of her book were optioned for a TV series by MGM television in 2018.
